title: Advancing H2O2 electrosynthesis: enhancing electrochemical systems, unveiling emerging applications, and seizing opportunities
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,8137-8181
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00412D, Review Article
Zhiping Deng, Seung Joon Choi, Ge Li, Xiaolei Wang
Recent achievements in H2O2 electrosynthesis are reviewed, including electrocatalyst design, electrode optimization, electrolyte engineering, reactor exploration, potential applications, and integrated systems.
